segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and she seems so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the water overflowing, and it’s shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and it’s terrifying to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious everyone is to what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a slow-motion accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where you just want to yell a warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But no one seems to care, and that’s what’s really surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR
